articles.description: Manchester United submit an improved bid of more than £60m for Brentford striker Bryan Mbeumo.
articles.title: Bryan Mbeumo: Man Utd submit improved £60m bid for Brentford striker

articles.description: Fast bowler Josh Tongue says there is no situation in which England would see a draw as a good outcome from their thrilling first Test against India at Headingley.
articles.title: England vs India: Josh Tongue says 'no scenario' where draw is a good result in first Test at Headingley

articles.description: Botafogo through to last 16 of Club World Cup despite defeat to Atletico Madrid
articles.title: Atletico Madrid 1-0 Botafogo - Match report

articles.description: Paris St-Germain beat Seattle Sounders to seal their place in the Fifa Club World Cup knockout stages.
articles.title: PSG 2-0 Seattle Sounders: European champions seal place in last 16

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu praises Wimbledon for doing "an amazing job" to prevent a man who had been stalking her from buying tickets to the tournament.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu says Wimbledon did 'an amazing job' to prevent stalker from buying tickets to SW19

articles.description: Germany Under-19s play out their second game with double-figure goals in the space of six days - but are knocked out of the European Championship by Spain.
articles.title: Spain U19 6-5 Germany U19 (after extra time): Defending champions into final after 11-goal thriller

articles.description: Sampdoria will remain in Serie B after the league awards them a 3–0 win over Salernitana following the postponement of Sunday's second leg relegation play-off.
articles.title: Serie B: Sampdoria avoid relegation after being awarded victory over Salernitana

articles.description: The British and Irish Lions have warned Australia the Wallabies' superstars must appear for their Super Rugby sides in the tourists' pre-Test series matches.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions demand Australia release stars for tour matches

articles.description: Fast bowler Jofra Archer shows encouraging signs while making his first first-class appearance for four years for Sussex against Durham.
articles.title: Jofra Archer: England bowler returns for Sussex - how did he fare?

articles.description: As Tommy Fleetwood continues to wrestle with how to get over the winning line on the PGA Tour, American golf is trying to fathom how having a playing captain might work at this year's Ryder Cup, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Tommy Fleetwood's stumble gives US Ryder Cup team a Keegan Bradley-sized headache
